com.samsung.android.sdk.pass

Class Spass

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pass.Spass
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.samsung.android.sdk.SsdkInterface

    public class Spass
extends Object
implements com.samsung.android.sdk.SsdkInterface

    This class is the entry class that provides access to the Pass package. This class provides methods for initializing the Pass package and for checking which Pass features are supported

    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEVICE_FINGERPRINT
      SDK sub-type for a fingerprint provides the default Identify request and Dialog display.
      static int DEVICE_FINGERPRINT_CUSTOMIZED_DIALOG
      Provides the API that allows customized Dialog display.
      static int DEVICE_FINGERPRINT_FINGER_INDEX
      Provides the API that allows Intended Fingerprint Index for Identify request.
      static int DEVICE_FINGERPRINT_UNIQUE_ID
      Provides the API that allows getting index and fingerprint unique IDs.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Spass()
      Creates an Spass instance.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the version number of the Pass package.
      String getVersionName()
      Gets the version name of the Pass package.
      void initialize(Context context)
      Initializes an instance of the Pass package.
      boolean isFeatureEnabled(int type)
      Checks if the Pass feature is available on the device.

    • Method Detail

      • getVersionCode

        public int getVersionCode()

        Gets the version number of the Pass package.

        Returns:
        The Pass package version number.
        Since:

      • getVersionName

        public String getVersionName()

        Gets the version name of the Pass package.

        Returns:
        The pass package version name.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException

        Initializes an instance of the Pass package.

        Parameters:
        context - The Context for your application.
        Throws:
        SsdkUnsupportedException - Thrown if the Pass package is not supported on the device.

        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the Context passed is null.

        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the Context passed is not valid.

        SecurityException - Thrown if the permission is not set as "com.samsung.android.providers.context.permission.WRITE_USE_APP_FEATURE_SURVEY"

        Since:
        1.0.0

      • isFeatureEnabled

        public boolean isFeatureEnabled(int type)

        Checks if the Pass feature is available on the device.

        Parameters:
        type - The feature ID (use DEVICE_FINGERPRINT, DEVICE_FINGERPRINT_FINGER_INDEX, DEVICE_FINGERPRINT_CUSTOMIZED_DIALOG, DEVICE_FINGERPRINT_UNIQUE_ID)
        Returns:
        true - if the Pass package feature is available on the device.
        false - if the Pass package feature is not available on the device.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - Thrown if the method is called before calling the "initialize() method".

        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the feature ID passed is not valid.

        Since:
        1.0.0
